yaml: Methods to Convert R Data to YAML and Back

Source: R/yaml-package.R
yaml-package.Rd

Implements the 'libyaml' 'YAML' 1.1 parser and emitter (https://pyyaml.org/wiki/LibYAML) for R.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/r-lib/r-yaml/

  • https://r-yaml.r-lib.org

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/lib/r-yaml/issues
